title: Bolivia : internet penetration 2000 to 2017
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of individuals using internet, containing a total of 18 data points.
Overall Percentage of individuals using internet has increased over the Year.

Percentage of individuals using internet is roughly increasing from 2000 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, rapidly increasing from 2003 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Percentage of individuals using internet, about 43.83 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Percentage of individuals using internet about 1.44 was reached at Year 2000
